name: unitsscn

body.origin:
|- wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cc)
-| wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cr)
-| wss(cr, cc)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cc)
-| wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cr)
-| wss(cr, cc)

|- wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cc)
-| wss(cr, cc)

comment: The closed unit interval is a subset of the set of the complex numbers. Useful lemma for manipulating probabilities within the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Dec-2016.)
